pageContext.claim: “A terrible lie. How can she do such a thing? [quoting a tweet that reads, ‘It appears Ambassador Yovanovitch did not accurately answer this question I asked her during her “impeachment inquiry” deposition under oath.’]”
pageContext.analysis: Some Republicans including Trump made the dubious claim that former ambassador to Ukraine Marie Yovanovitch lied in her testimony to the House impeachment inquiry. Yovanovitch said in her opening statement that the Obama administration never raised the Hunter Biden-Ukraine issues with her. But, as she had previously testified to the same committee in a closed-door deposition, Obama advisers did help Yovanovitch prepare answers to questions about Biden and Burisma as part of the Senate confirmation process.
